00020 K_PLUGIN_FACTORY( ConfigLogFactory, registerPlugin<ConfigLog>(); )
00021 K_EXPORT_PLUGIN( ConfigLogFactory( "kcm_kshowmailconfiglog" ) )

00023 ConfigLog::ConfigLog( QWidget * parent, const QVariantList & args )
00024   : KCModule( ConfigLogFactory::componentData(), parent, args )
00025 {
00026   //build GUI
00027   //---------
00028   //main layout
00029   QVBoxLayout* layMain = new QVBoxLayout( this );
00030 
00031   //widgets for deleted mails log
00032   QVBoxLayout* layDelMails = new QVBoxLayout();
00033   layMain->addLayout( layDelMails );
00034 
00035   chkLogDeletedMails = new QCheckBox( i18n( "Log mails deleted by filter" ), this );
00036   chkLogDeletedMails->setToolTip( i18n( "Check to activate the log of mails deleted by filter." ) );
00037   layDelMails->addWidget( chkLogDeletedMails );
00038   connect( chkLogDeletedMails, SIGNAL( toggled( bool ) ), this, SLOT( slotChanged() ) );
00039   connect( chkLogDeletedMails, SIGNAL( toggled( bool ) ), this, SLOT( slotChangeItems() ) );
00040 
00041   QVBoxLayout* layDelMailsConfig = new QVBoxLayout();
00042   layDelMailsConfig->setMargin( 20 );
00043   layMain->addLayout( layDelMailsConfig );
00044 
00045   grpDelMailsRemove = new QButtonGroup( NULL );
00046   connect( grpDelMailsRemove, SIGNAL( buttonClicked( int ) ), this, SLOT( slotChanged() ) );
00047   connect( grpDelMailsRemove, SIGNAL( buttonClicked( int ) ), this, SLOT( slotChangeItems() ) );
00048   btnDelMailsRemoveExit = new QRadioButton( i18n( "Remove log entries at exit" ), this );
00049   grpDelMailsRemove->addButton( btnDelMailsRemoveExit, ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AT_EXIT );
00050   layDelMailsConfig->addWidget( btnDelMailsRemoveExit );
00051 
00052   QHBoxLayout* layDelMailsConfigDays = new QHBoxLayout();
00053   layDelMailsConfig->addLayout( layDelMailsConfigDays );
00054   layDelMailsConfigDays->setAlignment( Qt::AlignLeft );
00055   btnDelMailsRemoveDays = new QRadioButton( i18n( "Remove log entries after" ), this );
00056   grpDelMailsRemove->addButton( btnDelMailsRemoveDays, ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS );
00057   layDelMailsConfigDays->addWidget( btnDelMailsRemoveDays );
00058   spbDelDays = new QSpinBox( this );
00059   spbDelDays->setMinimum( 1 );
00060   spbDelDays->setMaximum( 999999 );
00061   connect( spbDelDays, SIGNAL( valueChanged( int ) ), this, SLOT( slotChanged() ) );
00062   connect( spbDelDays, SIGNAL( valueChanged( int ) ), this, SLOT( slotChangeItems() ) );
00063   spbDelDays->setSuffix( i18nc( "@label:spinbox number of days till deletion", " Days" ) );
00064   spbDelDays->setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy::Maximum, QSizePolicy::Fixed );
00065   layDelMailsConfigDays->addWidget( spbDelDays );
00066 
00067 
00068   //widgets for moved mails log
00069   QVBoxLayout* layMovMails = new QVBoxLayout();
00070   layMain->addLayout( layMovMails );
00071 
00072   chkLogMovedMails = new QCheckBox( i18n( "Log mails moved by filter" ), this );
00073   chkLogMovedMails->setToolTip( i18n( "Check to activate the log of mails moved by filter." ) );
00074   layMovMails->addWidget( chkLogMovedMails );
00075   connect( chkLogMovedMails, SIGNAL( toggled( bool ) ), this, SLOT( slotChanged() ) );
00076   connect( chkLogMovedMails, SIGNAL( toggled( bool ) ), this, SLOT( slotChangeItems() ) );
00077 
00078   QVBoxLayout* layMovMailsConfig = new QVBoxLayout();
00079   layMovMails->addLayout( layMovMailsConfig );
00080 
00081   grpMovMailsRemove = new QButtonGroup( NULL );
00082   connect( grpMovMailsRemove, SIGNAL( buttonClicked( int ) ), this, SLOT( slotChanged() ) );
00083   connect( grpMovMailsRemove, SIGNAL( buttonClicked( int ) ), this, SLOT( slotChangeItems() ) );
00084   btnMovMailsRemoveExit = new QRadioButton( i18n( "Remove log entries at exit" ), this );
00085   grpMovMailsRemove->addButton( btnMovMailsRemoveExit, ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AT_EXIT );
00086   layMovMailsConfig->addWidget( btnMovMailsRemoveExit );
00087 
00088   QHBoxLayout* layMovMailsConfigDays = new QHBoxLayout();
00089   layMovMailsConfig->addLayout( layMovMailsConfigDays );
00090   layMovMailsConfigDays->setAlignment( Qt::AlignLeft );
00091   btnMovMailsRemoveDays = new QRadioButton( i18n( "Remove log entries after" ), this );
00092   grpMovMailsRemove->addButton( btnMovMailsRemoveDays, ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS );
00093   layMovMailsConfigDays->addWidget( btnMovMailsRemoveDays );
00094   spbMovDays = new QSpinBox( this );
00095   spbMovDays->setMinimum( 1 );
00096   spbMovDays->setMaximum( 999999 );
00097   connect( spbMovDays, SIGNAL( valueChanged( int ) ), this, SLOT( slotChanged() ) );
00098   connect( spbMovDays, SIGNAL( valueChanged( int ) ), this, SLOT( slotChangeItems() ) );
00099   spbMovDays->setSuffix( i18nc( "@label:spinbox number of days till deletion", " Days" ) );
00100   spbMovDays->setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy::Maximum, QSizePolicy::Minimum );
00101   layMovMailsConfigDays->addWidget( spbMovDays );
00102 
00103   //the log of moved mails is not saved yet, maybe later...
00104   btnMovMailsRemoveExit->setHidden( true );
00105   btnMovMailsRemoveDays->setHidden( true );
00106   spbMovDays->setHidden( true );
00107 
00108   setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy::Preferred, QSizePolicy::Preferred );
00109 
00110   //get application config object (kshowmailrc)
00111   config = KGlobal::config();
00112 
00113 }

00119 void ConfigLog::load()
00120 {
00121   //set group
00122   KConfigGroup* configLog = new KConfigGroup( config, CONFIG_GROUP_FILTER );
00123 
00124   //load settings
00125   chkLogDeletedMails->setChecked( configLog->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_LOG_DELETED_MAILS, DEFAULT_LOG_LOG_DELETED_MAILS ) );
00126   chkLogMovedMails->setChecked( configLog->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_LOG_MOVED_MAILS, DEFAULT_LOG_LOG_MOVED_MAILS ) );
00127 
00128   QRadioButton* btnToCheck;
00129   if( configLog->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_REMOVE_DELETED_MAILS, DEFAULT_LOG_REMOVE_DELETED_MAILS ) == CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AT_EXIT )
00130     btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpDelMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AT_EXIT ) );
00131   else if( configLog->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_REMOVE_DELETED_MAILS, DEFAULT_LOG_REMOVE_DELETED_MAILS ) == CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AFTER_DAYS )
00132     btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpDelMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS ) );
00133   else
00134     if( QString( DEFAULT_LOG_REMOVE_DELETED_MAILS ) == QString( CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AT_EXIT ) )
00135       btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpDelMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AT_EXIT ) );
00136     else
00137       btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpDelMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS ) );
00138 
00139   btnToCheck->setChecked( true );
00140 
00141 
00142   if( configLog->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_REMOVE_MOVED_MAILS, DEFAULT_LOG_REMOVE_MOVED_MAILS ) == CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AT_EXIT )
00143     btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpMovMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AT_EXIT ) );
00144   else if( configLog->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_REMOVE_MOVED_MAILS, DEFAULT_LOG_REMOVE_MOVED_MAILS ) == CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AFTER_DAYS )
00145     btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpMovMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS ) );
00146   else
00147     if( QString( DEFAULT_LOG_REMOVE_MOVED_MAILS ) == QString( CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AT_EXIT ) )
00148       btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpMovMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AT_EXIT ) );
00149   else
00150     btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpMovMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS ) );
00151 
00152   btnToCheck->setChecked( true );
00153 
00154   spbDelDays->setValue( configLog->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_HOLDDAYS_DELETED_MAILS, DEFAULT_LOG_HOLDDAYS_DELETED_MAILS ) );
00155   spbMovDays->setValue( configLog->readEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_HOLDDAYS_MOVED_MAILS, DEFAULT_LOG_HOLDDAYS_MOVED_MAILS ) );
00156 
00157   //enable or disable Items
00158   slotChangeItems();
00159 }
00160 
00161 void ConfigLog::defaults()
00162 {
00163   if( DEFAULT_LOG_LOG_DELETED_MAILS )
00164     chkLogDeletedMails->setChecked( true );
00165   else
00166     chkLogMovedMails->setChecked( false );
00167 
00168   if( DEFAULT_LOG_LOG_MOVED_MAILS )
00169     chkLogMovedMails->setChecked( true );
00170   else
00171     chkLogMovedMails->setChecked( false );
00172 
00173   QRadioButton* btnToCheck;
00174   if( QString( DEFAULT_LOG_REMOVE_DELETED_MAILS ) == QString( CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AT_EXIT ) )
00175     btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpDelMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AT_EXIT ) );
00176   else if( QString( DEFAULT_LOG_REMOVE_DELETED_MAILS ) == QString( CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AFTER_DAYS ) )
00177     btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpDelMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS ) );
00178   else
00179     btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpDelMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS ) );
00180 
00181   btnToCheck->setChecked( true );
00182 
00183   if( QString( DEFAULT_LOG_REMOVE_MOVED_MAILS ) == QString( CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AT_EXIT ) )
00184     btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpMovMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AT_EXIT ) );
00185   else if( QString( DEFAULT_LOG_REMOVE_MOVED_MAILS ) == QString( CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AFTER_DAYS ) )
00186     btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpMovMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS ) );
00187   else
00188     btnToCheck = static_cast<QRadioButton*>( grpMovMailsRemove->button( ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS ) );
00189 
00190   btnToCheck->setChecked( true );
00191 
00192   spbDelDays->setValue( DEFAULT_LOG_HOLDDAYS_DELETED_MAILS );
00193   spbMovDays->setValue( DEFAULT_LOG_HOLDDAYS_MOVED_MAILS );
00194 
00195   //enable or disable Items
00196   slotChangeItems();
00197 
00198   slotChanged();
00199 }
00200 
00201 void ConfigLog::save()
00202 {
00203   //set group
00204   KConfigGroup* configLog = new KConfigGroup( config, CONFIG_GROUP_FILTER );
00205 
00206   //write settings
00207   configLog->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_LOG_DELETED_MAILS, chkLogDeletedMails->isChecked() );
00208   configLog->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_LOG_MOVED_MAILS, chkLogMovedMails->isChecked() );
00209 
00210   switch( grpDelMailsRemove->checkedId() )
00211   {
00212     case ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AT_EXIT     : configLog->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_REMOVE_DELETED_MAILS, CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AT_EXIT ); break;
00213     case ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS  : configLog->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_REMOVE_DELETED_MAILS, CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AFTER_DAYS ); break;
00214     default                           : configLog->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_REMOVE_DELETED_MAILS, CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AFTER_DAYS ); break;
00215   }
00216 
00217   switch( grpMovMailsRemove->checkedId() )
00218   {
00219     case ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AT_EXIT     : configLog->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_REMOVE_MOVED_MAILS, CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AT_EXIT ); break;
00220     case ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS  : configLog->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_REMOVE_MOVED_MAILS, CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AFTER_DAYS ); break;
00221     default                           : configLog->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_REMOVE_MOVED_MAILS, CONFIG_VALUE_LOG_REMOVE_MAILS_AT_EXIT ); break;
00222   }
00223 
00224   configLog->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_HOLDDAYS_DELETED_MAILS, spbDelDays->value() );
00225   configLog->writeEntry( CONFIG_ENTRY_LOG_HOLDDAYS_MOVED_MAILS, spbMovDays->value() );
00226 }
00227 
00228 void ConfigLog::slotChanged()
00229 {
00230   KCModule::changed();
00231 }
00232 
00233 void ConfigLog::slotChangeItems()
00234 {
00235   if( chkLogDeletedMails->isChecked() )
00236   {
00237     btnDelMailsRemoveExit->setEnabled( true );
00238     btnDelMailsRemoveDays->setEnabled( true );
00239     spbDelDays->setEnabled( true );
00240     switch( grpDelMailsRemove->checkedId() )
00241     {
00242       case ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS      : spbDelDays->setEnabled( true ); break;
00243       case ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AT_EXIT         : spbDelDays->setEnabled( false ); break;
00244       default                               : spbDelDays->setEnabled( true ); break;
00245     }
00246   }
00247   else
00248   {
00249     btnDelMailsRemoveExit->setEnabled( false );
00250     btnDelMailsRemoveDays->setEnabled( false );
00251     spbDelDays->setEnabled( false );
00252   }
00253 
00254   if( chkLogMovedMails->isChecked() )
00255   {
00256     btnMovMailsRemoveExit->setEnabled( true );
00257     btnMovMailsRemoveDays->setEnabled( true );
00258     spbMovDays->setEnabled( true );
00259     switch( grpMovMailsRemove->checkedId() )
00260     {
00261       case ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AFTER_DAYS      : spbMovDays->setEnabled( true ); break;
00262       case ID_BUTTON_REMOVE_AT_EXIT         : spbMovDays->setEnabled( false ); break;
00263       default                               : spbMovDays->setEnabled( true ); break;
00264     }
00265   }
00266   else
00267   {
00268     btnMovMailsRemoveExit->setEnabled( false );
00269     btnMovMailsRemoveDays->setEnabled( false );
00270     spbMovDays->setEnabled( false );
00271   }
00272 }
